resources.string:
Hey!
 
I'm passionate about dancing and I struggled to find an app having the features I need for my training. 
Therefore I created this app in my spare time. It is open-source, so if you are a developer or you are interested supporting the development, please reach out to me! 
 
Many thanks to Nadja, who convinced me to start dancing as a sport even though I didn't want to ;) And many thanks to all the great dancers and trainers at TSG Backnang, with whom dancing is so much fun. I wouldn't have stayed without you! 
 
I appreciate any rating, feedback, questions, wishes and suggestions. Please reach out to me personally or use https://github.com/idunas-sky/dance-music-player/issues 
 
Flo
No files found in import directory \'{0}\'
Loop-Marker set! To remove, long press the button
Create some playlists first to export them
Really delete playlist \'{0}\'? This can\'t be undone!
Notifications to display current song and pause / resume / play next song.
We need to access your files to allow you to choose songs for your playlist.
We need to access your \'Download\'-Directory to export playlists.
We need to access your files to allow you to play songs.
